prototypes.prototype: Object_List as C = :A5.LABEL_ENUM( [ Flag as N ] )
Next_Object_Name as C = :A5.LABEL_ENUM( Object_Name as C )

argument.name: Object_List
argument.description: A list of labels in various formats, depending on the Flag variable.

argument.name: Next_Object_Name
argument.description: The next label in the list of labels.

item.name: Null = Object name, full path, and filename.
4 = Object type, Object name, full path, and filename
8 = Quoted Object name, full path, and filename.
12 = Object type, quoted Object name, full path, and filename formatted for tree control.

argument.name: lastname
argument.description: The quoted name of a label.

page.description: Returns the name of the next saved Label layout.
page.discussion: The A5.LABEL_ENUM() method returns a CR-LF delimited list of all saved labels. Limitations: Desktop applications only.
